DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Participation Institution Contact Person Status Code FunctionalRoleStatus
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:The act of taking part in an activity.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._The code that describes a value specifying whether the state of participation of a role in the given study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:The act of taking part in an activity.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Study Protocol Participation Institution Contact Person
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:The act of taking part in an activity.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
The act of taking part in an activity.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that describes a value specifying whether the state of participation of a role in the given study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Exerting influence or producing an effect.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Allowable, usable, or acceptable.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To stop a process by imposing a freeze on it.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.
